basic.floral_language:
Othonna capensis 
Floriography: beautiful, smooth, vigorous
Has smooth and fleshy green leaves in long oval shape, like strings of beads, stems long, many branches, in a cool season with abundant sunlight, leaves turn purple red, especially beautiful, may be used as a hanging plant alone, high ornamental value, 
Likes abundant sunlight, has a short dormant period under summer high temperature, need shade properly under scattered light. Flowers when conditions are right. Flowers are yellow.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, yellow flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, with adequate sunlight turning to fuchsia

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, a short period of dormancy in summer, put in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, water less frequently under summer high temperature
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
